DOC.brief_summary: This study is an observational surveillance study to identify adults 50 years and older who present to a study healthcare facility with signs and symptoms of Community-Acquired Pneumonia.
DOC.brief_title: A Global Active Surveillance for Community Acquired Pneumonia
DOC.criteria: Adult subjects 50 years of age or older Subject must reside in the surveillance area Subjects who present to a study healthcare facility where the treating physician clinically suspects CAP Any subject who is transferred to a study healthcare facility after already being hospitalized for 48 hours or more at any other inpatient facility (such as a community hospital). Hospital Acquired pneumonia (ie, develops signs and symptoms of pneumonia after being hospitalized for 48 hours or more).
